titleStmt.title: By the Queene. A proclamation for adjournement of part of Michaelmas tearme. Forasmuch as the Queenes Maiestie our soueraigne ladie, is credibly enformed, that the infection of the plague is at this present in sundrie places in and about the citie of London, and in other places ...
Proclamations. 1578-09-22
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie[i.e. B. Norton and J. Bill],

notesStmt.note: Michaelmas Term is adjourned for plague.
